video.title: Medium
video.synopsis: Phoenix mother Allison uses her unusual psychic skills to help unearth evidence in unsolved crimes -- while struggling to juggle work and family.

episodes.synopsis: Wife, mother and psychic Allison DuBois speaks with the dead and is convinced her gift can solve crimes, and gets her chance with the Texas Rangers.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Phoenix District Attorney Manuel Devalos hires Allison to work for his office. She is asked to help in a jury selection to help convict a killer.
episodes.title: Suspicions and Certainties

episodes.synopsis: Allison is partnered with Det. Lee Scanlon on a case involving the strange murders of newlywed couples. Joe plans a surprise party for Allison.
episodes.title: A Couple of Choices

episodes.synopsis: A wolf chasing Allison as she's Little Red Riding Hood plagues her dreams. It starts making sense when a sketch artist gets an inaccurate description.
episodes.title: Night of the Wolf

episodes.synopsis: When visiting another psychic, Allison is told there's a dark cloud over her marriage. This only snowballs downhill for Allison both at work and home.
episodes.title: In Sickness and Adultry

episodes.synopsis: Allison believes a Good Samaritan raped and murdered a red-haired college student. Meanwhile, Allison may be pregnant and Ariel may be a math genius.
episodes.title: Coming Soon

episodes.synopsis: Allison knows that a girl who jumped off a cliff didn't commit suicide. Meanwhile, she predicts her husband's co-worker will die from a heart attack.
episodes.title: Jumpstart

episodes.synopsis: Allison's stepbrother returns from Iraq, where he earned the nickname Lucky. But Allison sees that he's haunted by a ghost, and might have the gift.
episodes.title: Lucky

episodes.synopsis: Nightmares of a cruel ogre haunt Ariel. While Joe worries about the dreams, Allison believes that Ariel can help a kidnapped girl by decoding them.
episodes.title: Coded

episodes.synopsis: Allison's recurring dream of two boys racing a train leads her to Prof. Leonard Cardwell, whose area of expertise is communication with the afterlife.
episodes.title: The Other Side of the Tracks

episodes.synopsis: Allison is sick. Her medicine gives her stranger than usual dreams and she has doubts about the identity of a real-life murderer.
episodes.title: I Married a Mind Reader

episodes.synopsis: Allison views an execution of an inmate, but investigates when the inmate's girlfriend is killed and the inmate's ghost is at the crime scene.
episodes.title: A Priest, a Doctor and a Medium Walk into an Execution Chamber

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams about a pilot saving a crashing plane. Later she learns the pilot is suspected of murder, but is confused about what her dream means.
episodes.title: Being Mrs. O'Leary's Cow

episodes.synopsis: An old case is reopened. Allison is confused to learn the convict did not commit the crime, and her colleagues may have tampered with the evidence.
episodes.title: In the Rough

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams about a teenage girl murdered by her doctor with a third person present at the scene, and meets a doctor convicted of a similar crime.
episodes.title: Penny for Your Thoughts

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Push helps Allison track down a serial killer who leaves a Bible quote at crime scenes, putting Allison's family and Push's health at risk.
episodes.title: When Push Comes to Shove: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Push hovers between life and death as Allison must figure out the clues before another murder, and Joe sees a counselor.
episodes.title: When Push Comes to Shove: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A song repeating in Allison's head leads to a clue about a missing coed. But when she confronts the church, she fears she won't find the girl in time.
episodes.title: The Song Remains the Same

episodes.synopsis: Allison has dreams about a woman in a psychiatric facility who is claiming to be her.
episodes.title: Time Out of Mind

episodes.synopsis: Allison's sleepwalking and dreams put her and her family at physical and financial risk.  Meanwhile, she must find a missing boy and his kidnapper.
episodes.title: Light Sleeper

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams of her good friend from high school, but cannot relate the dream to her current case.
episodes.title: Sweet Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Allison's vision of a murder could derail Devalos's re-election, and when Devalos keeps getting upstaged in court, Allison must find out the truth.
episodes.title: Dead Aim

episodes.synopsis: Joe is on jury duty for a man accused of murdering his wife. Allison has visions about the man but is ordered off the case for conflict of interest.
episodes.title: Judge, Jury & Executioner

episodes.synopsis: Allison's vision of a murder could potentially derail Devalos's reelection campaign, and Joe runs into an old girlfriend.
episodes.title: Too Close to Call

episodes.synopsis: Allison thinks there is another dimension in art. While at an exhibit, she sees 3-D images pop out, which help her to figure out a deadly secret.
episodes.title: Still Life

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams about hitting a girl with her car, while a woman whose house is haunted kills herself, leaving Allison to put together the pieces.
episodes.title: The Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: When a serial killer takes up residence in Allison's head, her behavior begins to worry Joe.
episodes.title: Method to His Madness

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Charles Walker returns to Allison's dreams, and this time it involves one of her daughters.
episodes.title: Doctor's Orders

episodes.synopsis: After Allison helps in the rescue of a kidnapped boy, disturbing dreams make her question whether it was the right thing to do.
episodes.title: Raising Cain

episodes.synopsis: Allison hits her head and goes to the doctor to get an MRI, where she sees a vision of another patient murdering several prostitutes.
episodes.title: A Changed Man

episodes.synopsis: Allison's dreams seem to be about a personal tragedy, but soon she realizes it has something to do with a murder at a coffee shop.
episodes.title: Sweet Child O'Mine

episodes.synopsis: Allison experiences a schizophrenic dream about the death of a man just before she's asked to help locate a man who is missing.
episodes.title: Allison Wonderland

episodes.synopsis: After Allison dreams that her brother Michael was involved in a bank robbery, he shows up unexpectedly and she fears the worst.
episodes.title: Lucky in Love

episodes.synopsis: Allison's dreams put her on the trail of a serial killer.
episodes.title: S.O.S

episodes.synopsis: Allison has a vision implicating Detective Scanlon in drug-related murders.
episodes.title: Knowing Her

episodes.synopsis: Allison has visions of a faceless man breaking into the home of a woman. Joe feels pressure at work.
episodes.title: The Darkness is Light Enough

episodes.synopsis: Allison is investigating the death of doctor while her dreams are haunted by the Angel of Death, who seems to be suggesting that her time is up.
episodes.title: Death Takes a Policy

episodes.synopsis: Allison has visions of what her life would be if she had become a high-powered attorney and married someone other than Joe.
episodes.title: Twice Upon a Time

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's dreams begin to have meaning -- especially Allison's and Bridgette's -- and an old flame of Allison's appears on her doorstep.
episodes.title: Four Dreams: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While Devalos takes ill, the home invasions continue, yet Allison can't figure things out. Joe is less than pleased by Clay Bicks's presence.
episodes.title: Four Dreams: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Allison keeps having the same dream -- or is it day -- and the clues she gets may help her prevent a tragedy.
episodes.title: Be Kind, Rewind

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Walker returns, and Allison's attempts to save a young girl may endanger her life.
episodes.title: Blood Relations

episodes.synopsis: Allison's birthday gift for Joe starts sending her messages, and a highway sniper terrorizes Phoenix.
episodes.title: Ghost in the Machine

episodes.synopsis: Allison meets an FBI profiler she admires, but her visions start to involve him.
episodes.title: Profiles in Terror

episodes.synopsis: Interconnected dreams begin when Allison and Ariel stumble upon a murder scene, and Ariel's resentment grows as she's asked to help catch the killer.
episodes.title: Mother's Little Helper

episodes.synopsis: Allison tries to rescue a boy that she sees in her dreams, while she also tries to find out about the circumstances of an assemblyman's recent death.
episodes.title: The Whole Truth

episodes.synopsis: Allison's attempts to help two ghosts who've bonded over their respective murders is slowed by one who left an inheritance to a woman he barely knew.
episodes.title: Better Off Dead

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams about the Dubois as dolls under control of a young boy. When the boy's father is found dead, her dreams reveal he may have been abused.
episodes.title: Very Merry Maggie

episodes.synopsis: Push has dreams about a series of crimes in Phoenix and contacts Allison, who believes that his visionary ability is due to his long coma in the past.
episodes.title: Apocalypse, Push

episodes.synopsis: Joe takes a turn at figuring things out when Allison is inhabited by another woman.
episodes.title: The One Behind the Wheel

episodes.synopsis: When Allison's dream seems to foretell Marie's death, she will stop at nothing -- including selling the house -- to change the future.
episodes.title: Second Opinion

episodes.synopsis: Sonny Troyer is back, but what's even more frightening is he's learned how to manipulate Allison to his own evil ends.
episodes.title: We Had a Dream

episodes.synopsis: Teenage Allison dreams about her future, her personal life and her work. Is it really the future she sees in her dreams? Can she change it?
episodes.title: The Boy Next Door

episodes.synopsis: When Devalos's childhood friends dies, Allison has her suspicions.  Joe puts in for a government project but a polygraph test creates issues.
episodes.title: Whatever Possessed You

episodes.synopsis: Allison's dread turns into horrifying reality when Joe is taken hostage at work, and Ariel must outwit her principal so she can call her mother.
episodes.title: Joe Day Afternoon

episodes.synopsis: Allison's brother, a phone-hotline psychic, helps a person whose husband was killed.
episodes.title: 1-900-LUCKY

episodes.synopsis: Allison is lead to a body, but while she waits for ID she encounters the ghost. Meanwhile, Joe has difficulty adjusting back to work since his leave.
episodes.title: No One to Watch Over Me

episodes.synopsis: Allison is involved in a murder trial, but things go wrong when another body is found. Joe sees a therapist, and a woman asks Allison for confidences.
episodes.title: Head Games

episodes.synopsis: Devalos deals with the aftermath of a case, Joe is approached by a lawyer, and Allison makes the decision to confide in Debra.
episodes.title: Heads Will Roll

episodes.synopsis: P.D. McCall's betrayal has devastating results for everyone in Allison's life, and Walter Paxton brokers a deal with the D.A.'s office.
episodes.title: Everything Comes to a Head

episodes.synopsis: Visions of a kidnapped boy plague Allison, who turns to a private investigator for help.
episodes.title: And Then

episodes.synopsis: Allison can't get a read from a victim's possessions, which may be caused by conflict with Ariel, who believes she's caught her mother in a lie.
episodes.title: But for the Grace of God

episodes.synopsis: Joe's interview takes a turn when he and Allison meet the boss' wife. Allison's dreams get her involved in the disappearance of the couple's daughter.
episodes.title: To Have and To Hold

episodes.synopsis: Allison completely loses her hearing after a wealthy young deaf girl is kidnapped, so Joe steps in to assist her and investigator Cynthia Keener.
episodes.title: Do You Hear What I Hear?

episodes.synopsis: Putting aside past clashes, Larry Watt hires Allison as a consultant. But Allison's dreams indicate that his client, a murder suspect, is guilty.
episodes.title: Girls Ain't Nothing But Trouble

episodes.synopsis: As Devalos runs to reclaim his D.A. seat, Allison has disturbing visions about the past of his old friend and political ally Senator Jed Garrity.
episodes.title: Aftertaste

episodes.synopsis: Joe's mother, Marjorie, comes to visit, and a murder case reunites Allison, Devalos and Det. Lee Scanlon.
episodes.title: Burn Baby Burn: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The police arrest Graham Stacey, while Allison's dreams confirm his version of events. Cynthia Keener doesn't think Allison's information is useful.
episodes.title: Burn Baby Burn: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Allison's dreams involve Cynthia Keener in a very personal way, and Joe's inspiration for solar power causes conflict with Allison.
episodes.title: Wicked Game: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Allison continues to dream about Cynthia Keener's daughter. Both she and Cynthia are convinced that Joanna Wheeler is the culprit, but need evidence.
episodes.title: Wicked Game: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams of a woman who picks up men in bars and kills them. The woman turns out to be a best-selling author on how to meet the opposite sex.
episodes.title: Lady Killer

episodes.synopsis: Allison works again with FBI Agent Edward Cooper, who executed a previous suspect when the criminal justice system failed to convict him.
episodes.title: Partners in Crime

episodes.synopsis: Allison struggles with connecting some recent "accidental" deaths.
episodes.title: A Cure for What Ails You

episodes.synopsis: Allison's new used car turns out to have been central to a murder, and her visions get a little interactive; a patent threat stresses Joe and Meghan.
episodes.title: Car Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Allison's dreams may solve a drug dealer's murder, but a deal with a relative takes a surprising turn. Joe's relationship with Meghan is strained.
episodes.title: Being Joey Carmichael

episodes.synopsis: Devalos gets surprising news that affects his candidacy, and Allison unravels the mystery of why a woman whom she once consulted committed suicide.
episodes.title: Drowned World

episodes.synopsis: Allison is asked by Devalos to help with a case involving a close friend, who thinks the previous D.A. mishandled her sister's murder.
episodes.title: Soul Survivor

episodes.synopsis: Allison sees the ghost of a man who dies observe a businessman choking a woman. The woman's body is found and Allison tries to identify the dying man.
episodes.title: Things to Do in Phoenix When You're Dead

episodes.synopsis: Allison begins acting compulsively after dreaming about the murder of a judge years before.
episodes.title: A Person of Interest

episodes.synopsis: Allison has a serious memory lapse. One moment she's talking to Ariel on her cellphone, and six hours later she wakes up under a freeway overpass.
episodes.title: ... About Last Night

episodes.synopsis: Allison's dreams point to a family member in the disappearance of the daughter of a local councilman whose stepdaughter waits for a heart transplant.
episodes.title: A Taste of Her Own Medicine

episodes.synopsis: After dreaming of the apocalypse, Allison becomes an infatuated survivalist, and dreams of a man and a teenage girl living in a bomb shelter.
episodes.title: Apocalypse ... Now?

episodes.synopsis: Allison is dubious when Cooper's ghost appears with information on the long-unsolved murders by a serial killer known as the Gentleman Caller.
episodes.title: A Necessary Evil

episodes.synopsis: After dreaming about two couples being taken prisoner in a remote house, Allison finds herself investigating the death of only one of the couples.
episodes.title: Truth Be Told

episodes.synopsis: Two siblings ask Allison and Scanlon to help find their mother, though Allison had a nightmare where one sibling wanted to shoot her and Joe in bed.
episodes.title: All in the Family

episodes.synopsis: On Marie's birthday, Allison stops by Devalos's home, where she finds him being held at gunpoint by a man Devalos convicted for murdering his wife.
episodes.title: Then ... and Again

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams of a man who thinks she's the devil incarnate. After her car breaks down, she realizes the tow truck driver is her stalker.
episodes.title: The Devil Inside: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Allison's stalker continues to appear and tells her he's manipulating her dreams. Ominously, Harvey starts to appear before the girls in their dreams.
episodes.title: The Devil Inside: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams that she, Joe and the girls live in fancy house, where a forbidden room reveals the body of a young woman slashed and blood-soaked.
episodes.title: How to Make a Killing in Big Business: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Despite changing jobs, Allison passes information to Scanlon and Devlos, while her dreams point to a police detective being involved in the murder.
episodes.title: How to Make a Killing in Big Business: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Allison continues to dream about the eye-gouging killer and realizes that her new boss, Mr. Lydecker, is out to protect the killer's identity.
episodes.title: How to Make a Killing in Big Business: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: At a crime scene, Allison loses consciousness and is taken to the hospital, where a patient claims that Allison's being is now in his body.
episodes.title: The Man in the Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Allison's dreams of Cynthia Keener, leading to a prison visit that reveals her dream dealt with an old case involving the kidnapping of a young woman.
episodes.title: The First Bite Is the Deepest

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams a bank teller predicts a robbery, which the teller ascribes to her own dream, but their dreams don't agree when the crime happens.
episodes.title: The Talented Ms. Boddicker

episodes.synopsis: Allison is terrified by dreams of the future that suggest her family is going to be murdered by an assassin of the Mexican drug cartels.
episodes.title: Bring Me the Head of Oswaldo Castillo

episodes.synopsis: After having been in a coma for three months, Allison has spent a month undergoing physiotherapy to try and regain the use of her right hand.
episodes.title: Déjà Vu All Over Again

episodes.synopsis: When Ariel begins acting erratically, Allison becomes troubled and suspects that her daughter might be possessed by the spirit of a murdered stripper.
episodes.title: Who's That Girl

episodes.synopsis: When a cancer-stricken friend dies suddenly, Allison suspects that the woman's illness did not kill her, but a hospital staffer.
episodes.title: Pain Killer

episodes.synopsis: Allison begins to dream of a serial killer who has not struck in 11 years, and dead bodies with the familiar cryptic symbols begin to appear.
episodes.title: The Medium Is the Message

episodes.synopsis: When Allison investigates an infant's kidnapping, Joe worries when she becomes too attached to the little boy.
episodes.title: Baby Fever

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the disappearance of a funeral director, Allison dreams that she's in the movie The Night of the Living Dead.
episodes.title: Bite Me

episodes.synopsis: Scanlon asks for Allison's help in deciphering blast marks the police have found in the desert near a power plant.
episodes.title: New Terrain

episodes.synopsis: If Allison's dreams are to be believed, her daughter is dating a murderer.
episodes.title: Once in a Lifetime

episodes.synopsis: When Allison develops an odd sensitivity to light, the sunglasses she wears reveal mysterious numbers which could tie into people's life expectancies.
episodes.title: The Future's So Bright

episodes.synopsis: When samples of a deadly viral disease go missing, Allison's strange visions could help prevent a massive bio-terror attack.
episodes.title: You Give Me Fever

episodes.synopsis: The police hunt a serial killer targeting innocent women, but when the prime suspect dies, his ghost contacts Allison.
episodes.title: An Everlasting Love

episodes.synopsis: The anniversary of his daughter's death re-opens old wounds for Devalos, but Allison's dreams lead to the girl's true reasons for her actions.
episodes.title: Dear Dad ...

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams of a schizophrenic child, whom she later meets as the well-adjusted roommate of a missing psychiatric patient.
episodes.title: Psych

episodes.synopsis: A perplexed Allison must figure out why she keeps seeing the face of one man in the faces of other people in her daily life.
episodes.title: Will the Real Fred Rovick Please Stand Up?

episodes.synopsis: After Allison is mugged, she decides to take charge by enrolling in self-defense classes. Also, Devalos investigates a teenager's rape.
episodes.title: How to Beat a Bad Guy

episodes.synopsis: Allison and Joe's wedding is revisited, and as she prepares for the big day, she must also cope with the increasing strength of her special gift.
episodes.title: Allison Rolen Got Married

episodes.synopsis: Allison and her daughters dream of the same mysterious girl who may be linked to the bizarre serial murders of entire families.
episodes.title: There Will Be Blood ... Type A

episodes.synopsis: With Jennifer living in her house, Allison begins to better understand that her young ward has been seeing the murders through the killer's eyes.
episodes.title: There Will Be Blood ... Type B

episodes.synopsis: After a neighbor is murdered, Allison installs a talking burglar alarm, which she later suspects may be communicating with Marie.
episodes.title: Sal

episodes.synopsis: A distressed Ariel begins to lose hours and then years of time in her life and must look to her future self.
episodes.title: Time Keeps On Slipping

episodes.synopsis: Allison's dreams of pigs may lead to finding a young animal rights activist who has been missing for a few weeks.
episodes.title: Dead Meat

episodes.synopsis: When Allison's brain tumor resurfaces, its aftermath could have life-altering consequences for her friends and family.
episodes.title: It's a Wonderful Death

episodes.synopsis: Allison is approached by Gary Durant who wants something done about the harassment directed at his elderly father.
episodes.title: Bring Your Daughter to Work Day

episodes.synopsis: Allison sees floating symbols above people's heads, signs that she thinks could match them with their perfect mate.
episodes.title: The Match Game

episodes.synopsis: Scanlon is haunted by dreams of his late brother, leaving Allison concerned about her colleague.
episodes.title: Means and Ends

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a missing girl's murder, Allison experiences more friction with Scanlon after finding a possible link to his late brother.
episodes.title: How to Kill a Good Guy

episodes.synopsis: When Allison gets a skin graft on her hand after a burn, she is puzzled when the same hand acts with a mind of its own.
episodes.title: Talk to the Hand

episodes.synopsis: After an earthquake, Allison gets a premonition that Phoenix will get another ground shaker of sorts at 9:18 a.m. but doesn't know the exact day.
episodes.title: Where Were You When...?

episodes.synopsis: Allison wakes up unable to understand a word anyone says. She can speak and be understood by everyone but when they speak, she hears gibberish.
episodes.title: Native Tongue

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams of a teenage girl caught in a room with a fire raging around her.
episodes.title: Smoke Damage

episodes.synopsis: Allison and Joe are concerned when they learn that a convicted rapist, Clark Kerwin, moves into the neighborhood.
episodes.title: The People in Your Neighborhood

episodes.synopsis: The police investigate the death of a man who fell, or was pushed, in front of a commuter train.
episodes.title: Blood on the Tracks

episodes.synopsis: Allison dreams about her brother Michael being down and out and talked out of jumping off a bridge by an unknown individual.
episodes.title: Only Half Lucky

episodes.synopsis: A man desperately seeks Allison's help to determine the true nature of his wife's disappearance.
episodes.title: Labor Pains

episodes.synopsis: On his way home home from a business trip to Hawaii, Joe calls Allison to let her know what time he's arriving. However, he never makes it.
episodes.title: Me Without You
